Title: Authorizes a personal income tax deduction for home heating expenses
Summary: Authorizes a personal income tax deduction for expenses paid during the taxable year by a qualified taxpayer attributable to the cost of residential heating, including, but not limited to amounts paid for fuel oil, coal, wood, propane, natural gas, electricity, steam, kerosene and any other fuel used to heat such taxpayer's primary residence.
ActClause: AN ACT to amend the tax law, in relation to authorizing a personal income tax deduction for home heating expenses
